items.title: Beginner Sewing: Making a Tote Bag
items.headline: A complete instructional guide for creating a sewn, lined, tote bag.
objectives_summary: Safely operate a sewing machine
Learn to customize a sewing pattern to make any size tote bag.
Sew a tote bag with pockets and lining

items.title: Advice and Guidance on Choosing a Career in Fashion Design
items.headline: Essential information and supporting tools to help you get started on the path of a career in fashion design.
objectives_summary: A better understanding of the range of fashion career opportunities that are available in the field of fashion.
Have a clearer insight into what type of career you might like to follow.
Know what you can do to prepare yourself even before you have finished education at school.

items.title: Printing on Fabric: 5 Techniques to Get You Started
items.headline: A textile starter pack to get you started in the fiber arts and fashion design.
objectives_summary: Experiment with textile design techniques to create unique fabric.
Become familiar with textile dyes and inks
Safely handle chemicals and dyes associated with textile and surface design

items.title: How to Promote your Clothing Line.
items.headline: Learn how to create a brand image, market and sell your fashion line.
objectives_summary: Create a brand image around their product, know how to market it and find the target to sell.

items.title: Learn Fashion and Personal Styling
items.headline: All about Fashion Styling, Personal Styling and Styling your own Business
objectives_summary: Fashion and Personal Styling

items.title: Photoshop for Textile Design
items.headline: Adobe Photoshop for CAD designers / Textile artists. Prints: repeat, color reduction, color matching, plaid and weave
objectives_summary: Photoshop for Textile design, Fashion CAD design
17 Lectures and about 3 hours of content!
Creating print repeat- straight and half-drop

items.title: Learn to draw Fashion Sketches and Become a Fashion Designer
items.headline: Draw fashion sketches and become a fashion designer to design cloths
objectives_summary: You will learn to become a Fashion Designer
You will learn to design beautiful clothes
You will learn to draw fashion sketches

items.title: Dress without pattern. Quickly and simply. Intuitive sewing.
items.headline: Create beautiful things of your wardrobe very simply!
objectives_summary: You will learn how to easily and quickly create things for your wardrobe. As a designer of clothes. Discover the creative potential.

items.title: Fashion Illustration-Beginner to Intermediate Complete Guide
items.headline: Fashion Illustration
objectives_summary: You will learn about Fashion Illustration from Beginner Level to Intermediate Level

items.title: Fashion Design: Collar, Buttons and Cuffs Marvelous Designer
items.headline: Make a detailed 3D Dress Shirt with Collar, Cuffs and Buttons.
objectives_summary: Set up folders that show in the library panel
Use the Internal Polygon Tool for Cutting Fabric
Use the Sewing Tools: Segment and Free Hand Sewing

items.title: Tie Dye & Ice Dye classes
items.headline: Tie Dye & Ice Dye classes for beginners and advanced dyers.
objectives_summary: Tie-dye & Ice Dye techniques taught by Master Dyers start to finish from basic ring burst to elevated fashion forward patterns.
Taught by Master Dyers, our Tie-Dye Class instructors have been on the Bravo hit show Project Runway as teachers to the contestants!
Kids Tie-Dye class taught by Kids for Kids

items.title: FASHION ILLUSTRATION FOR PEOPLE WHO CAN'T DRAW
items.headline: EXPERIMENTAL FASHION DRAWING
objectives_summary: how to draw and illustrate in a variety of mediums from pencil and pen to coloured tools including pastels, watercolours and collage
You will leave the course having produced a mass of drawings & illustrations for your portfolio
This short course is a great introduction to experimental and expressive fashion drawing

items.title: Advanced Silk Thread Jewelry
items.headline: Silk thread Necklace and earrings
objectives_summary: Make beautiful earrings, necklaces, and bracelets using thread (or other beads) to wear, give, or sell!
Learn to make several pairs of earrings, bracelets, and necklaces with variations on each style.
Learn to create variations on these basic techniques in order to imagine and design your own unique jewelry creations!

items.title: Merch by Amazon Word Cloud T-Shirt Design
items.headline: How To Create A Word Cloud TShirt Design For Merch By Amazon or Teespring or any of the other Print On Demand Platforms
objectives_summary: DISCOVER where to source silhouettes for FREE for use as a mask
LEARN how to manipulate your chosen silhouette so that you can use it within your design
FIND OUT how to quickly and easily create a list words associated with your word cloud

items.title: Beginner Sewing for Tweens and Teens
items.headline: Through the creation of a small tote bag your teen/tween will learn how to use a sewing machine safely.
objectives_summary: Safely operate a sewing machine and iron.
Learn to effectively control a sewing machine
Create a small tote bag.

items.title: Fashion Design: Stitches and Zippers in Marvelous Designer
items.headline: Design a 3D Hoodie Sweater with Stitches and Zippers
objectives_summary: Basics of adding Stitching to an Garment
Basics of adding a Zipper to a garment
How to make a Hoodie or Jacket with Hood
